introduction_english: The word we'll be learning in this section is うらやむ, which you will often hear in situations when discussing others' achievements, possessions, or qualities that provoke feelings of envy or admiration.
meaning_explanation_english: The word "うらやむ" means to feel envy or to be jealous of someone. It is used when you notice something admirable or desirable about others' possessions, status, achievements or qualities, and you wish you had them too. It's a common feeling when you see someone excelling in areas you wish you could excel in.
kanji_explanation: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.
synonym_explanation: The most common synonym of the word うらやむ is "しっとする" which also means to be jealous or envious. While "うらやむ" focuses more on the feeling of desiring what others have, "しっとする" can sometimes carry a more negative connotation, implying spitefulness or resentment.
antonyms: 敬う : うやまう : to show respect for
antonym_explanation: The most common antonym of the word うらやむ is "うやまう" which means to respect. While "うらやむ" implies a sense of longing or envy, "うやまう" reflects admiration or acknowledgment of someone's worth or abilities, devoid of jealousy.

example_sentences.kanji: 彼は友達を羨んでいます。
example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)は友達(ともだち)を羨(うらや)んでいます。

translations.EN: He is envious of his friend.
translations.ES: Él está envidioso de su amigo.
translations.VI: Anh ấy ghen tị với bạn của mình.
translations.MY: သူသည် သူ၏ သူငယ်ချင်းကို မနာလိုသည်။
translations.HI: वह अपने दोस्त से ईर्ष्या करता है।

example_sentences.kanji: 彼は友達の成功を羨む。
example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)は友達(ともだち)の成功(せいこう)を羨(うらや)む。

translations.ES: Él envidia el éxito de su amigo.
translations.VI: Anh ấy ghen tị với thành công của bạn mình.
translations.FR: Il envie le succès de son ami.
translations.NE: उ उनी साथीको सफलतालाई डाहा गर्छन्।
translations.BN: সে তার বন্ধুর সফলতাকে হিংসা করে।
translations.TL: Naiinggit siya sa tagumpay ng kanyang kaibigan.
translations.MY: တော်သူငယ်ချင်းရဲ့ အောင်မြင်မှုကို မနာလိုဖြစ်တယ်။
translations.HI: वह अपने दोस्त की सफलता से जलन करता है।
translations.FA: او به موفقیت دوستش حسادت می‌کند.

example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)は友達(ともだち)を羨(うらや)む。

translations.VI: Anh ấy ghen tị với bạn của mình.
translations.MY: သူငယ်ချင်းကို မနာလိုသည်။
translations.HI: वह अपने दोस्त से ईर्ष्या करता है।

example_sentences.kanji: 私は時々他人を羨みます。
example_sentences.furigana: 私(わたし)は時々(ときどき)他人(たにん)を羨(うらや)みます。

translations.ID: Saya kadang-kadang iri dengan orang lain.
translations.ES: A veces, envidio a los demás.
translations.VI: Thỉnh thoảng tôi ghen tị với người khác.
translations.BN: আমি মাঝে মাঝে অন্যদের ঈর্ষা করি।
translations.TL: Paminsan-minsan na naiinggit ako sa iba.
translations.MY: ကျွန်ုပ်က တခါတစ၊ အခြားသူများကိုမန်ဘွယ်ပါတယ်။
translations.HI: मैं कभी-कभी दूसरों से ईर्ष्या करता हूँ।
translations.FA: من گاهی اوقات به دیگران حسادت می‌کنم.

example_sentences.kanji: 彼は友達の結果を羨む。
example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)は友達(ともだち)の結果(けっか)を羨(うらや)む。

translations.ES: Él envidia los resultados de su amigo.
translations.VI: Anh ấy ghen tị với kết quả của bạn mình.
translations.FR: Il envie les résultats de son ami.
translations.NE: उ अाफ्नो साथीको परिणामलाई डाह गर्छ।
translations.BN: সে তার বন্ধুর ফলাফলকে ঈর্ষা করে।
translations.TL: Naiinggit siya sa resulta ng kaibigan niya.
translations.MY: သူသည် သူငယ်ချင်းရဲ့ ရလာဒ်ကို မနာလို ကြည့်ရှုသည်။
translations.HI: वह अपने दोस्त के परिणाम से ईर्ष्या करता है।
translations.FA: او به نتایج دوستش حسادت می‌کند.

to envy.MY: မနာလိုအားရစေခြင်း

parts_of_speech: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Transitive verb
